name: Project Static
description:
Project Static

Hey guys and welcome to my tiny gameplay prototype for my upcoming Platformer game. This is an absolute prototype for testing so there may be bugs in it. Sorry if you encounter one! Please give me honest feedback and I will definitely consider any suggestion / comment to give you guys the best possible experience. 

I will steadily upgrade the version here once I am test-ready with new features/levels. As I am working full time too, the updates may sometimes be more or less frequent. 

I hope you enjoy my little gameplay demo and stay updated on here!
Cheers, your Deadpixel Studio 1-Man Team.

If the game lags, because of visual effects try toggling them to play without them.

Any Donations will go straight into the development of the game in form of assets/commisions for the game. <3

CONTROLS:

Keyboard:

  • Arrow-Keys for movement (incl. Jumping on arrow up) 
  • C for dashing (can be used mid air too, but stops right after the dash is done, which will be changed with the next version)
  • Q for attacking 
  • E for heavy attack (costs energy)
  • W for shield (if used at the right time can parry projectiles)
  • ESC for pause (blurred) [Game is automatically paused if tabbed out]
  • O to toggle visual effects

  Controller: 

  • Left Stick for movement 
  • Cross (PS4) or A (XBOX) for jumping
  • Circle(PS4) or B (XBOX) for dashing
  • Square (PS4) or X (XBOX) for attacking
  • Triangle(PS4) or Y(XBOX) for heavy attack (costs energy)
  • R1(PS4) or RB(XBOX) for shield (if used at the right time can parry projectiles)
  • Options (PS4) or Start (XBOX) for pause (blurred) [Game is automatically paused if tabbed out] 
  • L2 (PS4) or LT(XBOX) to toggle visual effects

Known Bugs:

  • Ranged Bot doesn't die sometimes

Credits: Most of the Sprites are from the great  @penusbmic and some made by myself.
